title: J.R. Smith | Ep. 130 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball

description:
The hoops legend J.R. Smith returns to ALL THE SMOKE for a big episode 130. He discusses his college golfing career, the Lakers missteps, playing golf with MJ and much more.
